alert.note: Alert for Brown (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 9:02AM MST until December 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Areas of reduced visibility. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Brown County. * WHEN...Until noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
